page.title: 04MATTERS OF LOCAL CONCERN
page.content: In{Lower Redbrook villagers}would like to have improved T.V. reception, a 30 m.p.h.speed limit,better bus services, and provision of mains sewerage. Deepest concern is felt about delays in plans for the development and expansion of the village, including provision of a village hall, to ensure its continued viability as a community with its own school and facilities for young people. The building of old people's bungalows/flats would release family council houses. {Young people}in the area would like their own youth club and organized outings. They are worried about lack of job opportunities in the area in fields other than garage work,shop and office work,building and part-time cafe work. They are anxious about preserving this beautiful area and to have a voice in the community.
